name.description: The name of the definition project

description.description: A description of the definition project. Should explain what the purpose is and why others should use it.

text_pattern.description: Lua string patterns that, if matched in the content of a file, will recommend this defintion project get applied. These should be as unique as possible to prevent this project from being recommended too often and annoying users.

filename_pattern.description: Lua string patterns that, if matched to a filename, will recommend this definition project get applied. These should be as unique as possible to prevent this project from being recommended too often and annoying users.

settings.markdownDescription: Configurations to insert/overwrite in the user's local config file when this definition project is applied.
